articles.title: Ten newborns killed in hospital fire in northern India - BBC.com
articles.description: People broke windows trying to reach their children at the neonatal ward in Jhansi, local media report.
articles.content:
At least 10 newborns have died in a fire at a hospital in northern India after a blaze broke out in the neonatal ward.
Chaos and panic ensued as the fire spread, relatives of the infants have told l… [+1986 chars]
